summary: The document is a memorandum dated 10 March 1978, from Robert D. Clark of the Office of General Counsel, detailing a meeting in New York City with a defector referred to as GRgENEEe Band and his wife. The meeting involved discussions about a mortgage on a property in New York City and the signing of a classified document acknowledging a devised facility as an instrumentality of the United States Government. The document also notes objections to the mortgage.
key_findings: Meeting involved a defector and his wife regarding a property mortgage.
A classified document was signed acknowledging a devised facility as a U.S. Government instrumentality.
Objections were raised against the mortgage arrangement.
